description: Create a project transport plan segment tractor.

flags.name: project-transport-plan-segment
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty segment ID.

flags.name: tractor
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty tractor ID.

permissions: Authorized via ProjectTransportPlanSegmentTractorPolicy, which delegates create permission to the related project transport plan segment policy.
side_effects: Creates a project transport plan segment tractor record linking a segment to a tractor.
validation_notes: Requires --project-transport-plan-segment and --tractor. The tractor must belong to the same trucker as the segment. Each segment can only have one tractor relationship. Project transport plan segment and tractor relationships are create-only.
